resources.string: Do you want to Change Language ?
It’s a kind of Lao noodle food which is popular, easy to find for eating in everywhere in Laos and also enjoyed at any time of the day.
Sticky rice is the staple in Lao which have access in every meal, where it is especially beloved and it tells the Lao unique actually.
Papaya salad is the kind of spicy food, is a type of salad made from sliced raw papaya which mixed with a seasoning and some ingredients. It’s very famous dish in a group of Lao teenager.

Larb is a traditional dish made from chopped meat, chicken or duck and mixed with some ingredients .we can see this kind of food in every Lao traditional festival such as : PI MAI LAO, Warm house festival… because they believe it will bring luck to them. \n- Larb: It’s means lucky of Lao.
Khao rarm it’s a sticky rice in bamboo then take it to burn. We can see this food in the Lao traditional festival.
Khao jee pate is a typical Lao food, baguette is filled with tomatoes, cheese, pork, meat topped, chili sauce… and it’s also famous breakfast for Lao because it’s fast making and easy to eat.
Or larm is the traditional food form the northern of Laos. Most of this comprises mainly vegetables such as: bean, Chilies, green onion… and optional meat (Classically prepare with buffalo meat).
Also known as ‘sai oua’, Lao sausage makes a pleasant appetizer or snack. Chopped pork meat,seasoned with herbs such as lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, shallots, cilantro...
